parse.title: An Awfully Big Adventure: J.R.R. Tolkien

wikitext.*:
'''''An Awfully Big Adventure: J.R.R. Tolkien''''' is a documentary about [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and features interviews from people such as [[Humphrey Carpenter]], [[Alan Lee]], [[Tom Shippey]], [[Christopher Tolkien]], [[Rayner Unwin]], and J.R.R. Tolkien himself.
